description:
Adds printer settings to the sidebar.

NB: Changes made in the sidebar override values set in the machine definition and end up in quality profiles. It is not recommended to use this plugin unless you understand the implications: USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

The development of this plugin can be sponsored via Github Sponsors (https://github.com/sponsors/fieldofview) or Paypal (https://www.paypal.me/fieldofview)
